feed.title: Maksim Kukushkin
feed.subtitle:
I'm a PhD Student in the [Neuromorphic Information Processing Group](https://nmi.informatik.uni-leipzig.de/) at Leipzig University. In addition, I work as a Research Associate in the Digital Research Methods in Medicine Group at Martin Luther University. My PhD is supervised by [Jun.-Prof. Thomas Schmid](https://umh.de/forschung/nachwuchsgruppen/nwg-schmid) and [Prof. Martin Bogdan](https://nmi.informatik.uni-leipzig.de/staff/prof-dr-martin-bogdan/).
I was also a visiting PhD student in the [MaVi Group](https://uob-mavi.github.io/) and worked with [Dr. Tilo Burghardt](https://tiloburghardt.github.io/) and [Prof. Majid Mirmehdi](https://majidmirmehdi.github.io/).
My research interests span the broad area of deep learning, computer vision, hyperspectral imaging, multimodal learning, and action recognition.
Before PhD, I worked @[CHECK24](https://check24.de) and @[Posterlounge](https://posterlounge.de/).
